data.name: Queen of Seas - Original Sound Track
data.detailed_description:
Queen of Seas - Original Sound Track

Full original chiptune album from the game Queen of Seas.

Tracks:
01 - Belief 4:28 (Derek Volker)
02 - Deep Dive 3:11 (Derek Voker)
03 - Just a Fisherman's Son 2:23 (Derek Volker)
04 - Proof of Faith 2:47 (Derek Volker)
05 - The Queen of Seas 2:21 (Derek Volker)
06 - Beach Sunrise 0:33 (Wesley Elliott)
07 - Hidden Sea 1:00 (Wesley Elliott)
08 - Time to Dive 0:36 (Wesley Elliott)

Total lenght: 18 minutes
